methodology.contractData: State checkbook data scraped from OpenTheBooks.com covering fiscal years 2017-2020. Records deduplicated by year+employer+vendor+amount combination. Totals aggregated by contractor name matching.
methodology.campaignFinance: PAC expenditure files downloaded from Ohio Secretary of State FTP server. Parsed using grep-based extraction due to malformed CSV format. Expenditures aggregated by recipient.
methodology.crossReference: Contractors identified in checkbook data were matched to PAC donors. Politicians receiving PAC money were matched to policy decisions affecting those contractors.
limitations: Some campaign finance CSVs had formatting issues requiring grep parsing
Individual employee donations not fully analyzed
Post-2020 contract data requires public records request

attribution: Data sourced from OpenTheBooks.com (a project of American Transparency) and Ohio Secretary of State public records. Analysis performed January 2026.
